Petisi Online Pecat Ade Armando, Universitas Indonesia Bungkam
05 Nov 2019, 06:34 by Ade Ridwan Yandwiputra (kontributor), Dwi Arjanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Usai dilaporkan ke polisi, Dosen Fakultas Fisip Universitas Indonesia, Ade Armando kembali dipersoalkan, terkait unggahan meme Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan yang dipermak menjadi tokoh fiksi Joker.
Dalam laman petisi online change.org, sebuah akun bernama Nadine Olivia membuat petisi yang mengajak netizen mendesak Universitas Indonesia agar memecat Ade Armando.
Nadine menulis, Ade Armando yang dianggap sebagai seorang intelektual sering membuat gaduh karena pernyataannya yang selalu menyerang tokoh-tokoh politik, ulama dan bahkan sering juga memberikan pernyataan yang cukup membuat pemeluk agama Islam merasa resah.
“Kami berharap ada tindakan tegas dari Universitas Indonesia terkait oknum dosen ini yang sering membuat gaduh & berpotensi memecah belah kerukunan umat beragama di Indonesia dan menyerang secara personal kepada tokoh politik maupun ulama,” tulis Nadine dalam petisi itu.
Nadine menyebut, petisi online itu dibuat untuk menggalang dukungan masyarakat agar Universitas Indonesia segera memecat Ade Armando sebagai dosen di Universitas Indonesia.
Petisi yang dibuat Senin 5 November 2019 malam itu hingga Selasa siang 5 November 2019 telah ditandatangani sekitar 7.400 an orang.
Hingga berita ini diturunkan, pihak Universitas Indonesia enggan memberikan konfirmasi terkait petisi online tersebut.
Sebelumnya, Fahira Idris melaporkan dosen UI Ade Armando terkait meme Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan berwajah Joker. Fahira Idris, yang juga anggota DPD RI itu melaporkan Ade karena diduga melanggar Pasal 32 ayat 1 juncto Pasal 48 ayat (1) UU ITE.
text:
Online Petition of Pecat Ade Armando, University of Indonesia Mute
05 Nov 2019, 06:34 by Ade Ridwan Yandwiputra (contributor), Dwi Arjanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - After being reported to the police, Lecturer at the Faculty of Social Sciences, University of Indonesia, Ade Armando was again questioned, related to the upload of the Jakarta Governor's meme Anies Baswedan who was made a fictional figure of the Joker.
In the change.org online petition page, an account named Nadine Olivia made a petition inviting netizens to urge the University of Indonesia to fire Ade Armando.
Nadine writes, Ade Armando who is considered an intellectual often makes a noise because his statements are always attacking political figures, scholars and even often also giving statements that are enough to make followers of Islam feel uneasy.
"We hope that there will be firm action from the University of Indonesia related to this lecturer who often makes noise and has the potential to divide religious harmony in Indonesia and personally attack political figures and scholars," Nadine wrote in the petition.
Nadine said, the online petition was made to garner public support so that the University of Indonesia immediately fired Ade Armando as a lecturer at the University of Indonesia.
The petition made on Monday 5 November 2019 that night until Tuesday afternoon 5 November 2019 was signed by around 7,400 people.
Until this news was revealed, the University of Indonesia was reluctant to provide confirmation regarding the online petition.
Previously, Fahira Idris reported that UI lecturer Ade Armando related to DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan's meme with a Joker face. Fahira Idris, who is also a member of the DPD RI, reported Ade for allegedly violating Article 32 paragraph 1 in conjunction with Article 48 paragraph (1) of the ITE Law.
